Writer: Dan Harmon (screenplay), Rob Schrab (screenplay), Pamela Pettler (screenplay), Dan Harmon (story), Rob Schrab (story)
Title: Monster House
Actors: Ryan Newman, Steve Buscemi, Mitchel Musso, Catherine O'Hara
Plot: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 22 nominations.
